g.aria-label: X-axis for a discrete scale with 8 values: 2023, 2024, 2025, 2026, 2027, ending with 2030
Y-axis titled 'value' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 15
Symbol legend for fill color and stroke color with 3 values: Conservative Scenario, Moderate Scenario, Optimistic Scenario
Title text 'Forecast Total Addressable Metaverse Market, by Scenario'
g.text: Forecast Total Addressable Metaverse Market, by Scenario
